title: Amahuaca (1992) Genesis Portion
description: This fragment of the Book of Genesis, chapters 1 through 4, is in the Amahuaca language spoken in the Amazon Basin. It was translated in 1992.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Amahuaca
language.area: Southeast Amazon Basin, scattered in Ucayali and Madre de Dios states on the following rivers: Sepahua, Curiuja, Curanja, Upper Ucayali, Inuya, Mapuya, Purus, Aguaytía, Yuruá, Las Piedras. Also in Brazil.
